title: Vaan Engum Nee Minna Lyrics Endrendrum Punnagai Song Lyrics
stanzas:
Song: Vaan Engum Nee Minna
Singer(s): Aalap Raju, Harini, Devan, Pravin
Movie: Endrendrum Punnagai
Music: Harrish Jeyaraaj
Lyrics: Karky

My Love, its all for you
moon n sun shine on you ..

Vaan engum nee minna minna
naan enna naan enna panna, panna

en manam kinnathil, ne ennai ootrinaai
kai alliye ven vinniley
yen vannam maatrinaai

Vaan engum nee minna minna
naan enna naan enna panna, panna

en vanavilliley, nee nool parikiraai
annooliley un nenjinai yen korka paarkiraai

Oh oh priya priya
idhayathil adhirvu neeyaa
enadhunarvidhe  thavam kidandhadhey
tharai vandha varam neeyaa . (2)

Pookkal illaa ulaginiley
vazhndheney unnai kaanum varai
naan indro poovukulley sirai

un vaasam en vazhvin ellai enbeney
un vaasam nurai eeral naan
theendak kandaeney
moochu mutta thaan naan
unmel kadhal kondaeney

Vaan engum nee minna minna
naan enna naan enna panna, panna

en vanavilliley, nee nool parikiraai
annooliley un nenjinai yen korka paarkiraai

Paalai ondraai varundhirundhen
nee thaagam nadhiyena vandhaai
en vazhvil pasumaya thandhaai

Oh en nenjam neer endraal
neendhum meenaa nee..
en kadhal kadu endraal
meyum maanaa nee..

Vaan engum nee minna minna
naan enna naan enna panna, panna

en vanavilliley, nee nool parikiraai
annooliley un nenjinai yen korka paarkiraai

Oh oh priya priya
idhayathil adhirvu neeyaa
enadhunarviley thavam kidandhadhey
tharai vandha varam neeyaa . (2)
